EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName} - Send the whole team to the Virtual Compliance Week 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Hopefully you’ve received the most recent issue of Compliance Week Magazine, shipped to you this week. This complimentary copy is a thank you for being a longstanding member of our community.
I would also like to extend to you a personal invitation along with preferred rates to attend the 14th Annual Compliance Week Conference, May 20-22, 2019.
As the premier event for compliance practitioners, you’ll join 500+ of your peers to explore new insights and best-practices to stay ahead of the evolving regulatory environment.
Featured keynote presentations will be held from experts such as Stefan Passantino, Partner at Michael Best and former head of White House Counsel’s Ethics Program.
You’ll also be able to gain up to 19 CPE credits from more than 32 panel discussions, breakout sessions, and roundtable discussions on the most cutting-edge issues in risk, ethics, legal, audit, privacy, and governance.
Take action and become a full-access delegate today. Register here Use registration code: CCO-VIP for special pricing of $1,595 (an $800 savings)
Please let me know if there is anything I can assist with regarding the conference.
Thanks {!Contact.FirstName}, I look forward to seeing you in DC!
Best Regards,
Donna
{!User.Name} {!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
